1.content: As you were waiting in line to buy the new Sword Art Online game you also bought the nervegear set while buying the game. When you got home you set everything up for the launch time 13:00 hours before servers are up and running. As time rolled around you put the Nervegear on and started up and as it started up you were blinded and you saw...
1.title: Beginning

choices: With a rush of excitement and adrenaline.
In fear of what's to come.
11.content:
Your hands are callous with deft fingers, as you look up you can see other individuals materializing before your very eyes. Before you could get lost in the senses of this world, your attention is instantly distracted by the sound of someone calling your name. This voice is familiar to you and prompts you to turn your head in the direction of the voice where you see a strange guy with red beginning armor. He waves at you before approaching you and pushing through the crowd of new people logging in.
Granted this was the town of Beginnings, which meant he had to be your best friend that you just called on the phone only seconds of logging into the game. You call him by his nickname, causing him to snort at the ridiculous name.
"Pretty sweet huh?" he asks and you only nod in agreement.
"Let's go check this place out!" You tell him and he immediately follows suit.
Unfortunately you two don't get very far into the neighboring meadow and are instantly pulled back to the town of beginnings.
"What the..." You gasp and find that you are trapped in a sea of multiple players asking questions to each other like they were lost.
You try to poke your head above the crowd to spot your best friend with no luck, then in a moment you could see silk red threading ooze through the cracks in the sky, as they instantly taint the skies with a glaring red warning sign.
A large cloaked man appears in the nest of red threading as his voice booms over everyone's, silencing them. His words begin to terrify you as he informs all that this game is real...if you die in the game you will be gone forever and you are trapped until all 100 levels are conquered.
Bright light blinds you for a second and now there is a mirror in your hand. The game master claims that this is a gift and as you gaze into the mirror you see your reflection...your real reflection. No longer do you have the features you desired, you are now stuck with your disheveled dark hair and plain dark brown eyes. Those flaws are now locked with you just as in the real world.
People are screaming, crying and gasping all around you that for a moment you want to wish that this isn't true and it can't be happening. But it is...it is...
Then your body begins to tremble...
11.title: Male hands

choices: Step forward and decide to help. Who cares if you're outnumbered!
Step back. Let's be realistic, you'd only protect loved ones. NOT strangers.
111.content:
Nothing like a positive attitude to help you in a tight situation! You decide to search for your friend and waste no time in pulling yourself away from the crowd. You catch a glimpse of someone who appears to be your friend from real life and chase after them. Soon it seems as if you'd lost them. As you attempt to scan the area you can see some people in the distance, training in a meadow. Then you remember that you need to learn how to fight too, after all, everyone should work together to complete the game right?
Before you can step out you see five other people approach the two and you stand frozen as you can see the life bar of one begin to get chopped off by another player. The friend screams and now...
111.title: With a rush of excitement and adrenaline.

choices: Try to fight back. Even though you're paralyzed, you might have a chance?
1111.content:
The five look at you and it doesn't take long for them to circle you. The sobbing person you just rescued escapes, you can't blame them for ditching you after all they just witnessed the loss of a friend.
You might not know how to fight here yet, but you know how to somewhat fight in real life. Unfortunately it seems that these people know what they're doing. You feel a slight pressure on your back and feel your body begin to numb.
You have been paralyzed...
1111.title: Step forward and decide to help. Who cares if y...

11111.content: You scream as loud as you possibly can in hopes that someone might hear.
11111.title: Scream for help!

choices: The five continue to fight the stranger
111112.content: You scream but to no avail no one is around but you and the five players. The players start attacking and your health bar starts to go down you get to the last stand of your life when someone runs up. The stranger starts to fight and pushes them to the edges of dying.
111112.title: Nobody hears

1111122.content:
when the paralyzed effect wears off you get up to see the boy who saved you he has black hair and is wearing the blue male starting armour he walks away muttering

"i hate bullies"

before you can thank him he dashes off and out of sight, inspired you decide that you would dedicate yourself to protecting people in this death game so you head back to town and look at the map and meet an NPC that looks like an old man

he says to you "please my family is starving please give kill some boars from the fields so i can feed my family i don't have much except for this family heirloom please"

you accept the quest and go to kill the boars it isn't easy the starting short sword is heavy and you aren't very coordinated but after two hours you have killed the required amount plus one extra for your own dinner and hand the items into the NPC he replies by saying "thank you, thank you" he hands you the Heirloom which is a amulet that has two shields on it

and you then gets a notification

while wearing this amulet you may wield two large shields at the cost of no other weapons of any kind

you then go to the market and sell your junk items for a large shield and equip it going back out to hunt on his way through town he sees that not everyone has the resolve he does many people are going crazy others are crying in the streets he stops by the bounty board and sees that there is a boss boar worth 500 Gil (the in-game currency) he accepts it and goes to hunt it down
1111122.title: The five flee

choices: testing these skills in the room
11111221.content:
once you found the boar you charged at it with your shield in front of you and rammed it with your shield and surprisingly it staggers the boar you then lay your sword into its body and it dies but to your surprise in the loot you find a ring that reads :all damage done while holding a shield is increased by 50% for each shield equipped and each piece of heavy armour worn

with then hunt over your realise that it is getting quite late so you head back to town and turn in the bounty your receive the GIL and sell junk items, using the money you buy a heavy chest plate and a second shield and use the remainder to get a room in the tavern

once back in the tavern you equip your new gear including the second shield you notice that this unequips your sword but you get a new notification that reads

dual shield wielding skill unlocked and then you read the flavour text

with your new found ability you cast aside the sword to become a protector with a shield this skill while wielding two shields you gain the following abilities:
- all damage done with shields is increased by 50%
- access to the dual shields skill tree

you go into the menu and open the status bar and see the current effects tab and see you currently have a total of 200% damage up due to your skills and equipped items

you then go to the skill tree and then go into the Dual Shields tab and see you have access to three new skills
- anchor howl; when used any enemies within 10 meters take 100hp of damage if they attack anything other than you
- fortress of shields; when used you plant your shields down either side of you creating a barrier that negates 99% of incoming damage for 5 seconds
- shield bash; you slam your shields into an opponent doing 150% your base attack stat in damage and stuns the enemy
11111221.title: the hunt

choices: join up with them whats the point of being a tank with nobody to protect
111112211.content:
the next morning you wake up ready to fight your way out of this game you march outside and look for a quest because every bit of XP and GIL helps so he found a basic kill quest that asked him to kill 20 goblins which he thought he could do but first he had to try out his new fighting style and see if it worked

he isolated one boar and tried shield bash it stunned the boar leaving it with hardly any health and he then hit it with his left shield killing it he saw the damage number read 232... from one hit that must be from all the damage buffs

now confident with his fighting style he saw two people getting cornered by three goblins one was a girl with two daggers and one was a boy with a spear he ran in and activated his anchor howl dealing damage to all the goblins as the attacked the pair he then activated the shield fortress ability, realising this was his chance the boy and girl each finished off two of the goblins while you shoved your right shield into the remaining goblins face killing it

after recovering you asked if the pair were alright they thanked you for your help and introduced themselves as jake and kate and that they were siblings you introduced yourself as Theandrethral as that was your username

"anyway thanks again for helping us Theandrethral" kate exclaimed

"no problem" you replied

"hey umm Theandrethral will you join our group?"
111112211.title: the next day

1111122111.content:
"sure why not" you reply

"can i ask you something?" kate asks

"sure" you replied

"in a game called SWORD art online a game about swords why would you use such an unorthodox fighting technique?" kate questioned

"yeah why do you do that?" jake wondered

"oh that's because i have an amulet and a ring that allow me too and give me a huge attack boost while doing so" you answered

"so are you currently doing any missions?"

"yeah i have one to kill 20 goblins i have only killed one so far but hey you guys could help me and in a group it would be done much faster"

"ok sure"

throughout the day you and the siblings killed goblins making strategies like kate and jake rushing in attacking them only for you to pop in and anchor howl and shield fortress while jake and kate attack them while the enemies attack you

it was almost pleasant it took your mind off the fact you could die at any moment because some sadistic freek decided to make a game where if you die in the game you die in real life at the end of the day you turn in the quest and get new leg armour boots and gloves all heavy to add to your damage boost adding another 150% to the damage boost jake and kate get some new armour too to compliment their fighting style you all buy something to eat and rent a separate room at the inn
1111122111.title: join up with them

1112.content:
Shaking your head, you realize that protecting your loved ones is the only way you would risk dying.
You find another path and spot a boy about your age leaving the town. Chasing after him you tell him to wait and eventually his steps slow down and he turns to face you.
"Can I come with?" You ask and at first he looks like he is about to decline but you press on. "We'll have better chances of survival. Come on."
He still doesn't look to happy with you coming along but nonetheless he introduces himself as Kirito and both of you dart off in the direction of the next town.
1112.title: Step back. Let's be realistic, you'd on...

choices: Tell him that you'll return someday. He is much safer here.
Sigh and tell him that you will stay.
112.content:
Your heart begins to race so fast that you fear it might come out of your chest. Parting your lips you feel that a whimper is about to escape until you hear a sob coming from the right, a child's sob. No one pays mind to the child as he keeps on crying for his family and now you feel a slight obligation to protect the little guy.
Approaching the child you can see him curl into a little ball against a stone pillar as the screaming around him only makes him tremble.
"Hey" The boys head shifts, meaning he'd heard you but he still hasn't moved. You kneel down in front of him so now that you are in eye level with him if he poked his head up. "Look at me, am I scared?"
Gradually he pokes his head out and looks at you with wide and scared eyes. You repeat the question and he shakes his head. You help him up and tell him that you two need to make it to the next town before nightfall.
Just as you two are leaving for the next town, a woman tells you to stop causing the both of you two stop and turn to face her.
"It's not safe out there for him" She tells you and you agree.
"But who else is going to take care of him?" you ask.
Just as you finish your question two other kids poke out from behind her and she offers to take care of him to which you agree. Unfortunately this causes the kid to break into a sob and clutches your leg, you...
112.title: In fear of what's to come.

1122.content: As the days progress the woman is grateful that you stayed. The kids love you and fight for your attention. Some days you look out the window, still waiting for the day that someone finishes the game. Who knows? Maybe next time you play a game like this, not involving death, you might actually have an adventure!
1122.title: Sigh and tell him that you will stay.

choices: With excitement and determination! You can do this!
In fear and realization. What are you going to do?
12.content:
Your hands are petite and feminine and as you look up you can see other individuals materializing before your very eyes. Before you could get lost in the senses of this world, your attention is instantly distracted by the sound of someone calling your name. This voice is familiar to you and prompts you to turn your head in the direction of the voice where you see a ridiculously beautiful blonde girl with pink beginning armor and skirt to match. She waves at you before approaching you and pushing through the crowd of new people logging in.
Granted this was the town of Beginnings, which meant she had to be your best friend that you just called on the phone only seconds of logging into the game. You call her by her nickname, causing her to grin and you grin right back.
"Pretty cool huh?" She asks and you only nod.
"Let's go questing!" You tell her and she immediately follows suit.
Unfortunately you two don't get very far into the neighboring meadow and are instantly pulled back to the town of beginnings.
"What the..." You gasp and find that you are trapped in a sea of multiple players asking questions to each other like they were lost.
You try to poke your head above the crowd to spot your best friend with no luck, then in a moment you could see silk red threading ooze through the cracks in the sky, as they instantly taint the skies with a glaring red warning sign.
A large cloaked man appears in the nest of red threading as his voice booms over everyone's, silencing them. His words begin to terrify you as he informs all that this game is real...if you die in the game you will be gone forever and you are trapped until all 100 levels are conquered.
Bright light blinds you for a second and now there is a mirror in your hand. The game master claims that this is a gift and as you gaze into the mirror you see your reflection...your real reflection. No longer do you have beautiful red locks or a flawless face, you are stuck with your wild long dark hair and plain dark brown eyes. Those flaws are now locked with you just as in the real world.
People are screaming, crying and gasping all around you that for a moment you want to wish that this isn't true and it can't be happening. But it is...it is...
Then your body begins to tremble...

choices: You step forward and decide to help. Who cares if you're outnumbered?
Take a step back. Let's be realistic, no way are you stepping in for strangers.

13.content:
User Name: Karina Torchia
Gender: Female
Skin: Olive
Hair: Mid-length, curly, graying black
Eyes: Hazel, somewhat small
Height: Short
Weight: Somewhat thin
Build: Narrow
Personality:
Mercurial - Your character tends to moodiness and unexpected changes in character and behaviour. Usually there is an underlying cause to this, the changes are not random. Your character may be psychotically insane, manic/depressive or even trying very difficult to be something they are not and when their true character shows through others are surprised at the change.
Agressive - An aggressive character may either have a great driving energy and initiative towards a goal, being aggressive in hunting or practising magic for example; or he may be aggressive in the sense that he is bullying, and quick to fight. Some mixture of both is quite likely
Primary Skill-
Two Handed Straight Sword
Heavy Metal Equipment
Cooking
Detection
Medicine Mixing
Secondary Skills-
Night Vision
Sprint
Battle Healing
Howl
Fighting Spirit
Tracking
Pursuit
13.title: Authors Choice

131.content: As you materialized in the world you look down and saw your avatar's feminine hand, then you were approached by a couple of people and you recognized them as your real world friends. Your friends asked you if you wanted to party up so they could show you the ropes of SAO (friends are beta testers). As you was about to answer their question you were teleported to the town center of Beginner Town. Then coming out of the sky you saw the GM (GameMaster) telling you that the logout button was missing and the only way out is completing all 100 levels.
131.title: Continue

14.title: Readers Choice

choices: think it would be best to stay in the town of beginnings
go out to finish this game and go back to the real world
141.content: You have just bought the nervegear and sao, you log in just in time for the launch and give yourself the username Phoenix. After a small amount of time getting used to the controls you are teleported back to the town of beginnings. Where the game master informs everyone that there is no log out button and that if you die here you die in real life. There is screaming and panic all around as through a special mirror item, your face changes to look exactly like your real face. You spend a long amount of time thinking about your loved ones and...

15.title: Readers Choice

choices: I need more information about myself
152.content:
You are Daisuke Usami:
Gender: Male
Preferred weapon: Katana since your unable, to use it right now, you use the curved sword.

Height: a bit larger than average

Hair: black, long bounded as a tail

Eyes: yellow rather unique, most people react, and acknowledge you by them.

Body: well trained, but not oversized in any way

Age: 28

Profession: you overtook your fathers dojo 2 years ago, which means you are a master in arms, trained since your 8 years old.

Reason you play: you train younglings in the dojo, they spoke about this reality rpg game with swords, you wanted to know, if real sword techniques do differences, or if it's just all stats and "grinding stuff"

Your skill affiliation is:
Any one sword technique, you've trained 20 years..., still you have to learn the skills in the game...
Others are:
Fishing
Cooking
Listening
Acrobatics
Sprint

Even though you are one maybe the most skilled person, it's your first game, mmorpg the first time you heard about this stuff, with other words you suck at it, you don't know how to efficiently do quests, or how to level your in game skills, open the menu... Inventory, everything you have to figure out yourself or ask the questions all players hate...

As for the charakter: you are mostly good natured, honorable, calm... Unless something serious and I mean SERIOUS is taking place for example: you see 4 people trying to kill one person out of greed or pleasure, than you put aside your honor, to stop them at all costs, likely slay them from behind or something like that, normally you would never do that, hell normally you wouldn't kill at all, if you see another way you try. As you can probably imagine you are very protective.

Things you hate: arrogance (always respect those infront of you), superficiality/discremenation (only because someone's small, doesn't mean he/she can't play the game, as well as others), sexism in both ways for example: you can't stand the sentence "a woman has to stay in the kitchen" as much as you hate "you can't punch a women" which connotes that you are allowed to punch men, you would rather say "you can't punch a humen or living being."

without that you are mostly open for anything, very trusting to strangers as you face them with respect and honor.

Your sexuality is hetero and you got engaged 2 weeks ago with your girlfriend, you had a 6 years relationship (she doesn't play the game), at the start you thought you would never betray her.

Though your character may change his opinions in a few ways, for example: after watching several people die by the hands of assassins (laughing coffin), you could start to distrust people more than before.
152.title: Other

info.brief_description: You are 1 of the 10,000 gamers who bought the VRMMORPG game.
info.description:
POINTS ARE AWARDED PER CHAPTER (200)
XxXEditXxX (If they are good enough to be awarded)
XxXEditXxX (You can also use other Author's Character's in your story line but don't kill them off)

These are the skills in the story can use and level up. Over time your sanity will drop and eventually you'll lose yourself and be forced to live a normal life within the game or commit suicide. (only if you don't fight to get out of the game) Weapons and Armor will degrade when used or hit, and the damage will also go down.

Non-combat Skills

Passive Skills

â Listening
â Detection - Prevents ambushes. Greater mastery allows detection of monsters in Â«HidingÂ» status.

Combat Skills

â Delay - Interupts opponents attacks whenever possible.
â Howl - Attracts the attention of NPC monsters and increases a player's Hate status effect. Often used by Tanks.
â Battle Healing - Recover certain amount of HP every 10 seconds. It can be leveled up by constantly getting one's HP into the red zone.
â Emergency Recovery
â Meditation - Â«Extra SkillÂ» Increases HP regeneration and decreases the remaining time of negative statuses by entering a mental concentration pose. Obtained in a 6th floor quest.

â Dual Blades - Â«Unique SkillÂ» Given to the player with the fastest reaction time.
â âHoly Sword - Â«Unique SkillÂ»

â Battoujutsu - Â«Unique SkillÂ» Means "Sword Drawing." [1]

Known Sword Skill Techniques

One-Handed Sword
â Slant - (1-hit strike) A simple sword skill slashing diagonally.
â Vertical - (1-hit strike) A simple sword skill slashing vertically.
â Horizontal - (1-hit strike) A simple sword skill slashing horizontally.
â Uppercut - (1-hit strike) A simple sword skill delivering an uppercut.
â Rage Spike - (1-hit strike) A basic, weak skill that leaps at the enemy and follows with an upward strike.
â Sonic Leap - (1-hit strike) A charge-type sword skill that dashes toward the enemy to deal a downward strike.
â Vertical Arc - (2-hit combo) A simple sword skill creating a 'V' shape trajectory.
â Horizontal Square - (4-hit combo) A mid-level sword skill tracing the shape of a rhombus.
â Vertical Square - (4-hit combo) A mid-level sword skill tracing the shape of a square.
â Snake Bite - (2-hit combo) Two left and right swings that target the opponent's weapon, with a chance of breaking the weapon.
â Armor Pierce
â Fad Edge
â Rapid Bite
â Sharp Nail - (3-hit combo)
â Shooting Star - A charging rapier sword skill.
â Vorpal Strike - (1-hit strike) A heavy one-handed sword skill with a reach that is double the length of the blade and has high attack power. It has a long cool-down.
â Savage Fulcrum- (3-hit combo) A sword skill that trace number "4" in the air.

One-Handed Curved Sword
